Module com.example.gamerguard
Package com.example.gamerguard.controller

Class DisplayGameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.gamerguard.controller.DisplayGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class DisplayGameController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for displaying game information in the UI. Handles interactions and updates related to the game display.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Serene Coders
